#summary Non-GTFS public transportation data feeds

This is a list of non-GTFS feeds.
(Please refer to [PublicFeeds] for a list of publicly available public transportation feeds in the [http://code.google.com/transit/spec/transit_feed_specification.html GTFS] format.)

|| *Agency* || *Area* || *Feed Location* || *Type* || *Format* || *Notes* ||
|| [http://www.trimet.org/ TriMet] || Portland, Oregon || http://developer.trimet.org/ws_docs/ || Real time departure predictions and vehicle locations || RESTful/XML || Registration for API key required ||
|| [http://www.bart.gov/ BART] || San Francisco Bay Area || http://api.bart.gov/docs/overview/index.aspx || Real time departure predictions, route and schedule information || RESTful/XML || [http://www.bart.gov/schedules/developers/api.aspx Developer page]||
|| King County METRO || Seattle, WA Metro || http://www.its.washington.edu/its_ws.html || Real time departure predictions || RESTful/XML ||  ||
|| [http://www.metro.net L.A. Metro] || Los Angeles, California || [http://developer.metro.net] || Trip planner API, Real time departure predictions (buses) || RESTful/XML || Trip planner: Registration for API key required ||
|| [http://more.nsw.gov.au/ NSW Government] || Sydney, Australia || http://131500.com.au/transport-data-exchange-program/nsw-public-transport-data-exchange-tdx-program || Network and schedule data || File set TransXChange ||  ||
|| [http://www.cta.com CTA Bus] || Chicago, Illinois || http://www.ctabustracker.com/bustime/APIDocument.jsp || Real time departure predictions and bus locations || RESTful/XML || Registration for API key required ||
|| [http://www.sfmta.com SFMTA] || San Francisco, California || http://www.sfmta.com/cms/asite/nextmunidata.htm || Real time departure predictions and vehicle locations ||  RESTful/XML || || 
|| [http://www.ytv.fi/fin ytv] || Helsinki Metro, Finland || http://developer.reittiopas.fi/pages/en/home.php || Trip planner API || RESTful/XML || Registration required, non-commercial use (test and development) || 
|| [http://www.traveline.info/mobile.html Traveline NextBuses] || England, Wales and Scotland ||  || Scheduled and some real time departure predictions || RESTful/XML || Registration required, commercial license || 
|| [http://www.eot.state.ma.us/developers MBTA/EOT] || Boston, Massachusetts || http://www.eot.state.ma.us/developers || Real time departure predictions and bus locations ||  RESTful/XML || Bus and Subway Services ||  
|| [http://www.wmata.com WMATA] || Washington, D.C. Metro || http://developer.wmata.com/ || Real time departure predictions for Metro Rail ||  RESTful/XML || Registration for API key required  ||  
|| [http://www.actransit.org/ AC Transit] || Alameda and Contra Costa Counties, CA || http://www.actransit.org/riderinfo/nextbus_XML_data.wu || Real time departure predictions and bus locations ||  RESTful/XML || 61 out of 175 routes ||  
|| [http://data.london.gov.uk/datastore/ London Datastore] || London, UK || http://data.london.gov.uk/datastore/package/tfl-timetable-listings || Network and schedule data || File set TransXChange || [http://www.tfl.gov.uk/termsandconditions/11402.aspx Terms and Conditions] ||
|| [http://data.london.gov.uk/datastore/ London Datastore] || London, UK || http://www.tfl.gov.uk/businessandpartners/syndication/16493.aspx#17615 || London Tube departure boards || RESTful/XML || [http://www.tfl.gov.uk/termsandconditions/11402.aspx Terms and Conditions] ||
|| [http://www.ttc.ca/ Toronto Transit Commission] || Toronto, ON Canada || [http://webservices.nextbus.com/service/publicXMLFeed?command=agencyList NextBus Webservices] || Real time departure predictions ||  RESTful/XML || ||  
|| Various Universities || US || [http://webservices.nextbus.com/service/publicXMLFeed?command=agencyList NextBus Webservices] || Real time departure predictions ||  RESTful/XML || ||  
|| DC Circulator, Charm City Circulator, US || Maryland, Virginia || [http://webservices.nextbus.com/service/publicXMLFeed?command=agencyList NextBus Webservices] || Real time departure predictions ||  RESTful/XML || ||

|| NYCT B63 || New York, NY || [http://bustime.mta.info/] || Bus locations ||  RESTful/XML || ||  



==We want to hear from you==
Not on this list? Please contact the group list at [mailto:googletransitdatafeed@googlegroups.com googletransitdatafeed@googlegroups.com] telling us the name of your organization and the web address of the feed. (Thanks for making your data available to interested developers!)
